General.Name: Bumi Teknokultura Unggul Tbk
General.Description: PT Bumi Teknokultura Unggul Tbk, through its subsidiary, engages in processing of cocoa bean in Indonesia. It offers cocoa butter, cocoa cake, and cocoa powder. The company also engages in the medicinal plant, logging, ornamental plants, and cut plants business; and provision of logs and logging services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Rukan Permata Senayan Complex, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12210

3.Name: Ms. Isma  Lediana
